history.proof: intros. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat IHn : power 1 n = 1 Unable to unify "power 1 n" with "power (power 1 n) n + 0".

original: intros. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. reflexivity.
